inn1.comm: some movement right away. It landed outside off and shaped in to move past the waft and hit the pad. It was missing the leg stump, though.
in the zone outside off, again tilting in a touch, left alone
This one is an outswinger and the batsman pushes inside the line ...
And so PK tries the dream ball, trying to swing it from the leg stump line. As it often happens, this one doesn't swing much and the batsman whips it past square-leg
full and moving away a touch, the batsman thinks about playing a shot but decides against it. Wise decision. Slips waiting for a mistake
goes after a similar delivery and it again swings away and luckily, for him, misses the outside edge.
on the middle and leg, flicked past square-leg

Whippity whip! It was the full delivery on the middle stump and he whipped it through midwicket. had he missed, he would have been caught plumb in front but he seemed pretty confident of playing that shot
around the middle and leg, line, turned behind square-leg for a single
gets across to push this length delivery to point
short in length, bounces on the middle stump line and he goes for the pull, misses, and is hit on the thigh
in the zone, angling away from Ingram who lets it go through to the keeper
good delivery ,shaping away late on the off-stump line and Guptill leans forward to defend and it runs of the outer edge past gully and Ojha, running to his left at third man, can't cut it off
leans forward to defend this length delivery to the off side.

PK has been getting some movement - both in and out - and strikes with this delivery. It moves away late from the off stump line and the batsman gets the edge on the defensive prod. He was looking to come forward to defend and tried to cover for the movement but it shaped away to catch the edge. Simple catch through to Dhoni.
Nice. He tries the inswinger this time and the batsman pushes it of the back foot
length delivery on the middle and leg, worked through wide midwicket for a single
short in length and outside off stump, the batsman thinks about playing a shot but withdraws his bat from the line of trouble
around the off stump line, he gets forward to push it back down the track.
around the middle and off line, straightens a touch, carefully pushed back to the bowler
slower, moves away from the off stump, gets away from the outside edge of the bat and bounces once before it reaches Dhoni.
gets on the back foot to dab this length delivery to midwicket
around the leg stump line, tilting in and it rolls away of the pads to backward square-leg region
lands outside off stump, Ingram goes back to punch it clear of backward point
Twhack! It was a delivery slipping down the leg side and Ingram plays the pick-up shot. Flicks it up and over square-leg.
He has already shown a penchant to use that bottom-hand of his and whip full deliveries through the on side. He does it again, this time through midwicket
steers this through to third man for a single
on the pads, a length delivery on the middle and the leg, flicked away past square-leg
shout for lbw. The ball is just outside off and hits him high on the pad as he shapes forward to defend,
Swing and a miss. Well there was some width on offer and he went after it but couldn't get wood on leather

Nehra gets some leather on wood this time. It was in the corridor, seaming away ever so late and Ingram was looking to defend but it got the outside edge. India on the attack here. Both bowlers fresh as they didn't play the Test series and doing the job here.
Right then, WIlliamson faces his first international delivery and squeezes this one to backward point
straightens on the middle stump line, turned to right of midwicket
on the pads, he tries to tuck it away but misses and the ball rolls away of the pad
And again. The bat comes down at an angle and he can't quite connect with the delivery on the pads.
around the off stump line, pushed away to covers
leans forward to push the length delivery back down the track
lovely delivery seaming away from the off stump line and Williamson pushes inside the line and the ball flies past the outside edge. He looks down at where the ball landed
And this time, he prefers no drama. He covers the off stump and shoulders arms. Dhoni collects it.

Out for a duck! What a ball, though. P E A C H. It curved in the air, landed on the middle stump line and you could sense why Williamson was shaping to play it towards say mid-on. But the ball moved away at the last instant, opened him up completely, and pegged back the off stump. Clatter! Things are bound to get better from here on Williamson. You can't get such a good delivery every time you walk out to bat. He doesn't look  back at the destruction. He has a look at where it landed, his mouth frozen into an bewildered expression of  'oooh' and he walks away.
in the zone outside off stump and Dhoni gathers
on the middle stump line, the pad comes first - dangerous- but the bat comes around in time - phew! - and the ball rolls to square-leg
short in length on the middle, clipped to the on side
works this to backward square-leg region to pick up a single
And as always Taylor pushes the pad across first before getting the bat around in time to play it towards mid-on
this one cuts away from the middle, towards off, and Taylor adjusts to stab it to the off
this one curves in from outside off and Taylor presents the full bat-face to defend
lands outside off and veers further away, left alone
just outside off, moving away again, squeezed out to backward point
around the off stump line, pushed back down the track

Shout for lbw  PK floated this ball in, the batsman had pushed that front leg too far across and couldn't get the bat around in time. He was hit in front of middle stump and  Hawk eye shows it would have clipped the outside half of the leg stump,
full and moving away, driven to the off side of the pitch and PK deflects it to mid-off
moves down the leg side and Dhoni collects
cuts back from outside off, more than what Taylor anticipated and he gets cramped but manages to punch it out to point
tip and run. He pushes it towards mid-off for what initially seemed a very quick single but turned out to be a pretty comfortably-taken run
fullish, on the middle, moving in and Styris works it between short midwicket and square-leg fielders
it lands well outside off and cuts back in sharply. Styris was looking to defend and was struck high on the pad outside the line of off stump

Shout for a catch behind decision. It was another incutter from outside off and again, Styris pushed outside the line of the delivery. It's cutting in more than he thinks it would. The ball hit the pad. I don't think there was any bat on it. The initial replays don't show any. Further replays on that shout for a catch throw more doubts! It looks as if there might have been an inside edge on to the pad. But no snicko (not yet at least) and no hot spot. Can't really say.
Another one that cuts back in from outside off and again Styris is in trouble. This time he is hit high on the pad.
pushes this delivery towards covers, thinks about a single but changes his mind
leans well forward to defend the length delivery to point
punches it to backward point and Yuvraj Singh fires a direct hit at the stumps at the non-striker's end
leans forward to work it to the midwicket region

PK thinks Taylor with his penchant to press his front leg across is an lbw candidate and is going after him. Another inswinger on the middle stump line, Taylor gets the bat in front of the pad to push it through to mid-on
around the off stump line, defended to the off side
Like in his first over, he pushes the first ball to the pads and Styris plays the leg glance to perfection. Oh may be not! Leg byes apparently! Where is the eye doctor!
gets behind the line to push this one away
another one that tilts towards the pads, Styris falls over a touch as he tries to flick it away and is hit on the pad.

Loud shout for lbw but turned down. It was another nip-backer, that cut in from outside off and Styris is in more trouble. He was hit in front of the middle stump but was saved by the height. It would have gone over the middle stump.
gets forward to defend this to the off side
on the pads this time, easily worked away to deep backward square-leg region
leans across to push this to covers
short in length, on the middle, pushed to the onside of the pitch
short in length around the off stump line, punched to the off side
gets back to punch this short-of-length delivery past the diving Yuvraj Singh at point
Whack! This time Yuvraj Singh can't take any pace of it. Taylor plays this back-foot punch very well and this time it bounces well over Yuvraj
Tiredness? This one slips down the leg side
shortish and outside off stump, Taylor goes after it but can't connect
leans forward to dab this to the on side and the ball rolls away to square-leg
taps this down to fine-leg region
shortish and outside off, Styris can't connect with the attempted cut. Dhoni collects
leans forward to defend a length delivery tilting in from outside off stump
fuller, straightens outside off - he might not have the ability to curve it away yet but slips in the straight ball now and then - and Styris drives through covers.
on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
on the middle and leg, driven back to Ojha
leans forward to off drive for a single
on the middle stump line, pushed to left of mid-on for a single
gets down the track and dabs it to right of midwicket
leans forward to defend back down the pitch
loopy delivery outside off and it's almost chipped to short extra cover. It falls short of the diving fielder
this one slips down the leg. Again, the first ball of the over.
gets forward to defend this back-of-length delivery
Crunch! It was a length delivery outside off and Taylor whiplashed it on the up and through cover point
strays on the leg and middle line, flicked away for a single
Crack of doom! short and well outside off and Styris cuts hard past the diving yuvraj singh at point. Fierce square-cut.
And pushes this one down the leg side. The last ball was an attempt at bowling the straighter one.
lands this outside off and cuts it back in to the middle, clipped past square-leg where that Indian crowd favourite Jadeja stops.
on the middle and off line, dabbed away to the on side
scramble for a catch! Taylor went for the sweep and it popped up on the off side. Raina dashed across from short extra cover and Ojha charged to his left but it fell nicely between them
leans forward to defend this one
around the off stump, steered to point
turns away sharply from Taylor who tries to withdraw his bat from the line but gets the edge and the ball rolls well clear of Sehwag at slip
turns away from the off stump, left alone
turns from the middle stump line, squeezed to point for a single
it turns away from the off stump, left alone
slightly short and the batsman cuts it past point for couple more runs
flighted outside off stump, leans forward to defend
Nicely played! It was turning away from the off stump and Taylor plays it late and cuts it well clear of backward point
around off stump, cut away to point where Yuvraj stops
Another short ball. Well not really short but short of length and not much turn. Taylor rocks back to cut it left of backward point
nice. Slow and turning away from the off stump, Styris was beaten, playing a drive

Dhoni misses a stumping chance Both the batsman and the keeper done in by the turn. It drifted in, landed on the middle stump line and Styris had charged down the track for the big hit and missed it completely. And Dhoni was moving towards his left and failed to take it cleanly
around the off stump line, squeezed to point
stays behind the line to defend to the on side
Run out appeal It has gone up to the third umpire. Not out. It was pushed towards backward point and Rohit ran to his right, picked and fired a direct hit at the non-striker's end
Another fine delivery, turning away from the middle and off line, Styris is beaten, trying to dab it to the off
leans forward to dab this to the on side
stays back to push this through to point
on the middle and leg, worked through square-leg
around the off stump line, pushed towards mid-on
leans forward to work this to right of mid-on
takes it from the off stump line and wrists it to square-leg
around the middle and leg line, Styris goes forthe paddle sweep and by the time Sehwag rushes back from slips, they come back for the second run
Ah! interesting. He again went for the paddle, then seemed to change his mind before he went again for that shot! It was pretty slow through the air.
leans forward to defend back down the track
stays back to cut this to deep backward point region where Jadeja stops
Ah! superbly played. It was the quicker one from Ojha, Taylor adjusted quickly to cut it late and plays it to the left of backward point
on the middle and off line, Taylor gets a leading edge, trying to work it across the line
goes down the track and drives to right of mid-on for a single
around the off stump line, pushed through mid-off
floated full outside off stump, square driven to deep point
leans forward to drive to mid-on for a quick single .. Rohit with the throw that misses the stumps. Taylor would have been home even if it had hit
goes back to punch it through wide mid-on region
around the off stump line, turned to the on side
slightly short in length, turns away from the off stump, Styris went for the cut but the ball flashed past the edge. Dhoni fails to collect it cleanly. Hmm
leans forward to play the off drive for a single

edged but clear of the diving Raina at short extra covers. It was a flighted delivery on the middle and leg and Taylor, like he did in the last over, gets a leading edge as he tries to work it against the turn. Raina charged to his left and dived but couldn't reach
gets forward to push this to the on side
Neat. He glided forward and lifted the flighted delivery over mid-on
Crack! Ojha tries to change his length after the previous delivery and drags this slightly short and Styris rocks back to cut it late to the backward-point boundary.
around the off stump line, worked wide of midwicket
outside the off stump, pushed towards Sehwag at backward point
on the middle stump line, eased down to long-on
quicker but shorter, clipped to deep midwicket where Jadeja stops
around the off stump line, punched to sweeper cover
short in length, punched down to long-on
around the middle and leg line and Taylor brings up his 16th fifty with a clip to square-leg. And he raises his bat to acknowledge cheers from the dressing room.
works this to the on side for a single
on the middle stump line, dabbed towards short midwicket
quicker, on the middle again, turned to square-leg fielder
leans forward to fetch it from off and middle and flick it to deep midwicket
on the middle stump line, wristed behind square-leg
Tonked! It was floated outside off and Styris went down on his knee to smash it over midwicket
shout for lbw but there was an inside edge. He was trying to turn it the on side and got an inside edge and also struck him outside off
leans forward to drive to covers
gets forward to ping sweeper cover. 100 of the partnership comes up. Needless to say, NZ were in some strife when these two started
quicker, around off and middle, punched to covers
around the off stump line, squeezed towards backward point
flighted on the middle stump line, Styris plays his fav sweep to collect two more runs
gets down the track and reaches outside off to steer it to point
tries to flick it from around off stump and is struck on the pad. he shuffles across and then tries to go the on side
quickish, on the middle stump line, dabbed to short midwicket
slower, around off stump, again worked towards short midwicket
works this one down to long-on for a single
around the middle stump line, punched to midwicket
around the off stump, punched to deep point
around the off stump line, pushed towards point for a quick single. Yuvraj fires a throw at the non-striker's end
leans forward to drive to the off side of the pitch
around the off stump, steered to backward point
leans forward to drive to long-off
lunges forward to on drive but the ball dips and turns to hit the pad
lands on the middle and leg and turns down leg. Styris fails to connect with the paddle shot
leans forward to work it to midwicket
charges down the track for the big lofted hit over long-on but the ball dips rapidly on him and he ends up dragging it to deep midwicket
It's time to slog-sweep. Taylor's fav hit. He went down on his knee and slapped this over the on-side boundary. Thump!
leans forward to dab this to the on side
on the middle and off, punched past the non-striker
on the pads, rolls away behind square-leg
quicker, on the middle, Styris gets back to clip it past square-leg
on the off stump line, squeezed behind square-leg for a single
slower, outside off stump, driven to short extra cover
on the middle and leg line, flicked through midwicket
leans forward to nudge this to square-leg
short in length, quickish, cut to backward point
around the off stump, driven to short extra cover
And again.
This time he drives it down to long-off for a single
Taylor went for the big expansive drive over extra covers but was beaten by the sharp turn. Dhoni collects
works this one to the leg side
Very nice! He sashayed down the track, reached forward and chipped it over the bowler.
Bang! He moved outside the leg stump and cut it hard through point region.
leans across and flicks straight to short midwicket
on the off and middle, on driven to long-on
gets forward to punch it down to  midwicket
fetches it from outside off and sweeps it hard but straight to the fielder in the deep
on the middle and leg, pushed towards the bowler
He seemed to slightly beaten in flight there but went through with the lofted drive over covers. He went inside-out and carved it up and over! Neat!
tries to dab this to the on side for a single and gets a leading edge to covers
pushes this through quicker and also, down the leg side
around the off stump line, dabbed to backward point for a quick single but Rohit Sharma fumbles
superbly adjusted! Styris was backing to the leg side and Ojha slowed it u and ave more air. Styris waited, leaned across and sliced it over point!
Appeal for stumping Third umpire into the act. Not out. It was the loopy delivery that turned away sharply. Styris was leaning forward for the drive but landed his back leg in time
length delivery on the middle and leg, turned past square-leg
shuffles to outside-off and has a swing to the on side. The ball was pushed further away from him and Dhoni collects
Beaten by the slower one this time. It moved across Styris who was through early with his square drive
Thump! Nehra bowls this short, perhaps he thought Styris would be charging out, but Styris waits back, reaches outside off and carves it over backward point
moves outside leg, Nehra follows him with a length delivery and Styris drags it to deep square-leg region
Crashed! He backed away to the leg side, Nehra tried to follow him with a full delivery, and he blasted it past mid-on
in the zone outside off, shapes away, Taylor tried to crash it on the up but made no contact
Whiplash! Fullish and outside off, Taylor went down on his knee to play a very stylish square drive.
shuffled towards off, steadied himself and drove it hard but couldn't beat the fielder at covers.
Slap-swat! Again, he went down on his knee and this time he slapped the slower one - short-of-length delivery outside off - to wide midwicket boundary
another slower one, outside off stump, cut to left of backward point where Yuvraj makes a tumbling half-stop
backs to the on side and clips the slower short-of-length delivery to midwicket
stays back to run this down to third man
short in length, angling away from Ross who stabs it to third man
Big swing and a miss. Styris tried to go over the on-side field but couldn't connect
guides this to backward point and they cross over
just outside off stump, chopped to Yuvraj at backward point
short in length, just outside off stump, punched past Yuvraj for a single
floated full outside leg stump, lapped around the corner
leans forward to push it wide of Yuvraj at point
on the middle stump line, on driven through wide midwicket. Rohit charges in from the deep but doesn't pick up the ball cleanly
quicker, on the middle and leg, turned to square-leg and Dhoni rushes after it
flighted full on the middle, eased to square-leg again
leans forward to flick it through midwicket.
leans forward to jab this to the on side for a single
sliding down leg, rolls of the pad to backward square-leg. Jadeja appeals. Dhoni runs after the ball.
on the leg stump line, tries to flick, misses and is hit on the pad
And again. Two in a row now. Styris practices playing it straighter
moves outside leg stump this time and chips this inside-out over covers
on that leg stump line, pushed down to long-on
Fabulicious! Scotty rushes down the track and lifts it over the straight boundary.
steers this to Yuvraj at point

Ojha takes him out! He had problem with Jadeja in the last over, playing across the line. And he does it again now. It was a loopy delivery on the middle and off stump line, Styris lunged forward and ended up playing all around it. He isn't happy as he walks off but what a fine knock this was. Oram walks in
turns in from well outside off and Dhoni collects
floated full outside off, on driven to long-on
leans well forward to defend it back to Ojha
around the leg stump line and Oram wrists it to fine-leg boundary and Ojha can't reach it. Oram just helped it along
gets down the track and drives to long-on
on the middle stump line, dabbed to square-leg
just outside off stump, driven wide of long-on and Taylor pushes hard to get back for the second run
Ah! The reverse sweep. It was around the off stump line and he reverse swept it  very fine through the vacant slip region
full and outside off stump, Oram pings long-on
works this behind square-leg for a single
gets back and across, reaches outside off and cuts to right of third man
short in length and outside off stump, cut off the back foot
Nehra tries the bouncer and Oram sways away. Taylor walks across for a chat
Trapped! That bouncer is followed by a skidding short-of-length delivery on the middle-stump line. Oram wafted across the line, bat going across in an angle, and missed. Gone!
length delivery around off stump, tapped close on the off side and Taylor rushes across
Sharp turn. It landed around off stump and turned big. Dhoni collects this.
around the off stump line, worked across the line to midwicket
flighted delivery around the off and middle, squeezed to backward square-leg
on the middle and off line, turned behind square-leg
around the leg stump line, quickish, worked to midwicket
around the off and middle, turned behind square-leg for yet another single
fullish, jabbed out to short midwicket

Out five short of 100. He played a fab knock but he is gone now. It was the full-length delivery  that straightened on the middle-stump line and he tried to work it across the line and missed it completely. Trapped! He has done the hard work and has put NZ in a strong position. Can the lower order push them on ahead?
short -of-length delivery that skids down the leg side . Taufel extends his arms
around the off stump line, dabbed to point region
Another one that slips down the leg side.
short in length outside off stump, defended to the off side
back-of-length delivery outside off, steered to third man
straightens on the middle and leg, clipped past square-leg
goes for the paddle sweep and gets it down to fine-leg region
on the pads, rolls down to short fine-leg region
lunges outside off and chips it uppishly towards sweeper cover
It turned away from the off and middle line, the batsman lunged out to defend and the ball spun past the edge and to Dhoni who broke the stumps and appealed. Third ump, rightly, says not out
around the off stump, pushed out to right of short extra cover where Raina makes a diving stop
leans forward to drive to Raina
around the off stump, slow, punched to deep-point region
moves down the track and drives to long-on
stays back to punch it to sweeper cover

Stumped! It drifted in from round the stumps and turned away. Elliott lunged forward to drive on the up and missed. Dhoni does the rest. NZ threatening to waste the end overs. India attempt to claw their way back
around the off stump line, and no run
drags this short and Tuffey  cracks it to the cover-point boundary.
on the leg and middle line, jabbed away to the off side
stabs this one past square-leg for a single
just outside off stump, guided to Yuvraj at backward point
He leaned across, picked it from the middle and swung it to left of deep backward square-leg region where PK gets some hand on it but doesn't prevent it from running over
gets forward to push this to covers
Thunderous! Tuffey unfurls the slog sweep to perfection. He swings this one over the on-side boundary. NZ move to 269
slower one, pushed to the off side for a single
the short-pitched delivery but it sails past the pull shot and slips down the leg side for a wide
on the leg stump line, jabbed to the off side
fullish and outside off, slashed away for a single
short of length delivery and it has been pulled to deep backward square-leg. Wild throw from the sub Virat and they take the extra run
shortish, outside off, cut away to deep point where Dinesh makes the stop
gets forward to push this to midwicket
banged in short and Hopkins goes for the big shot, attempts the pull shot but holes out at deep square-leg region
on the leg and middle, rolls close to the on side, Tuffey looks at Mills who responds
in the zone outside off stump, tries to tickle it to third man but can't connect
Forget tickling it down for a single, he plays a lovely upper cut this time! It was the short delivery outside off and he upper cuts it to third-man boundary
fuller in length and it straightens to moves past Mills' poke and goes to Dhoni,.
Boundary no 2 for Mills. It was the short-of-length delivery outside off stump and Mills flashes it to the point boundary
almost yorker length, on the middle stump line, squeezed out to the off side for a single
length delivery on the leg stump line, pushed to midwicket

Tuffey holes out at long-on. He cleared the front foot and drilled it high but couldn't clear the fielder at the boundary. Nice little cameo from him though to push NZ towards 300. Can they reach there?

They won't. Raina with the direct hit. It was pushed towards short extra cover. Mills charged across. His partner had frozen long time back. Raina picked the ball, Mills turned back and Raina fired. Gone! Fine performance from NZ to survive the pressure exerted by the early wickets and reach this far.

inn2.comm: length ball on off stump, Dinesh leans out and drives to mid off.. a hint of away swing there
this one is wider outside off and Karthik lets it go
back of a length and straighter this time, angles into Karthik who gets nicely behind the line and defends
Shot! Karthik it away with a pleasing cover drive.. that was not over-pitched, decent length on off stump, Dinesh reached out and drove along the ground through the covers

ooh, shortens the length and nearly foxes Karthik as he chooses to drive off the front foot again despite it being well short of driving length. It goes in the air but lands safely as it runs through the covers
another short of a length ball outside off and DK shoulders arms to end the over
Sehwag is away! fullish away-swinger bowled at a gentle pace of 121 kph well outside off, Sehwag had to reach out and make all the pace as he lofted it over the inner fielders in the covers.
better length, pushes Sehwag back as it comes in and he defends from the crease
a touch of away swing for Tuffey, from middle and leg stump, Sehwag closed the face a little early and got a leading edge but it went away safely through the off side
pushes him back again, Sehwag jumps back and looks to square drive, but can't find the gap. Good timing though

Jaffa! That's what happens here in Dambulla in the evenings under lights. That one reared up from a length and carried high, the keeper took it over chest high. Sehwag poked tentatively from the crease and managed to not nick it
this one is on a length on off stump, Sehwag leans into it and punches straight to mid off
short ball, curving from outside off line and DK lets it go through. Nice carry...
again, are these landing on the seam or what? It jumps up from a length and catches DK by surprise as he looks to forward press. Ends up hitting high on the bat as he takes his top hand off
short and wide outside off, asking to be hit. DK looks to crash it square without much feet movement and misses
DK chips out of the crease, he tends to do it a lot in order to unsettle the seamers. This was still too short for the drive as it came into him from off stump, and he defends to the leg side
length ball moving away from off stump line, Karthik punches confidently into the covers
down the track again, but Mills is reading Karthik's intentions well.. He keeps it short of a length and the batsman can't do much with it. Maiden over.
hmm, daring Tuffey.. strays onto Sehwag's pads at a gentle pace but the man plays it watchfully to mid on
good ball, darts back into Sehwag who is cramped for room as he thinks of scoring through the off side
lucky! Short ball angling down Sehwag's leg stump and it was there to be pulled. Sehwag went for the shot but ended up top-edging it high in the air towards third man.. It landed safe

more luck, this time for Karthik! He comes down the track and looks to turn him from the leg stump line towards midwicket, but is too early into the shot. The thick edge loops up into the covers but somehow lands safe between all the fielders!
lets this go to calm the nerves.. Jittery start from India, but no losses yet
this one comes in from off and middle, Sehwag in on the crease and brings the bat down to get an inside edge that dribbles away square for one
worked nicely off the pads, not much pace to work with and Sehwag focused on the placement to elude the fielder in front of square inside the circle. A couple of runs for his efforts
that's in Sehwag's area and he is not going to let them go! Short and wide outside off, Sehwag gets under it and flays it up and over through third man, a couple of bounces to the boundaries.
similar ball, not so short this time and Sehwag could not get under it.. plays the backfoot cover drive into the covers
similar length, not a bad one to bowl at Sehwag, but not much room for error.. Sehwag punches into the covers and steals a cheeky single. Direct hit might have made things interesting...
banged in short into Karthik's body, he gets inside the line and taps it to the leg side for a single
tries to tuck Sehwag with the short one this time, but it ends up sliding down the leg

ooh, Sehwag is not liking the lack of pace one bit.. 128 kph, short and not very wide outside off, Sehwag knows there is not enough pace for his favourite cut so he looks to instead pull it from outside off. The timing is all awry and it goes on the bounce to midwicket inside the circle
not good this.. Four wides sliding down the leg from Tuffey... Not very wide, it swung late from the leg stump line
better, hits the corridor outside off and gets some away movement too. Karthik gets behind the line and defends to the off side
on middle and leg, Karthik tries to tuck it around the corner to the leg side, and gets a single

another unplayable ball! It took off from a length, and just to make it even more unplayable, moved away sharply off the seam. Sehwag was thinking of the front foot cover drive initially and soon changed his mind to let it go.
this one is further outside off and Sehwag lets it go with conviction
length ball angling into Sehwag who is again early into the shot.. the flick goes uppishly towards mid on.. This is not a Sehwag kind of pitch.

timing written all over that! Every now and then, Karthik can play one of these shots from the batsman's guide to exquisite batting! It was angled into his pads from a length, and he was well forward, so by leaning out he could convert it into a half-volley. The wrists then came into play, keeping it to the right of mid on. Four more in the kitty.
flicked to the leg side for a single
on Karthik's off stump and he defends it into the covers
short and wide outside off, Karthik rides the bounce and cuts it through point. Fumbled by point.
banged in short, Sehwag decides to duck early as it flies through

short and just outside off, only one man can generate that kind of bat speed from so close to the off stump and get it off the face of the bat so fine. Kyle Mills and the fielder at third man found out the tough way. Four more.

got him! Sehwag has never liked the short ball aimed at the body and Mills did well to persist with that line of attack. Sehwag was in trouble once earlier looking to pull, this time he gets some glove on it as it goes down the leg and it is through to the keeper for an easy take. Sehwag is gone.

Two in Two! Dinesh Karthik goes this time, it was an in-ducker from outside off and Karthik played down the wrong line as he played the forward defensive. He missed the ball and was struck flush on the pads in front of off. It looked plumb despite the fact that he was standing out of the crease. Replays suggest it would have carried over the stumps, with the bounce but well...
lets it go outside off as it carries nicely to the keeper
short ball, looks to tuck Yuvraj up but he rises well on the toes and works it square for one
hint of away movement for Tuffey, Rohit gets forward and defends down the track
this one goes the other way, the ball is sure doing things here! Hits Rohit on the pads as he misreads the movement, but it was going down this time
ooh! Chips it off the pads, that came on a lot slower than he expected and he JUST about managed to squeeze it over the head of a leaping midwicket.
in the zone outside off, left alone
ooh .. this one straightened outside off, from short of length, and Rohit followed the ball and opened the bat-face. The ball fell short of the second slip.
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
lands just outside off stump and cuts away, left alone
Another one in the corridor outside off, left alone
lands short of length, cuts in from outside off stump, Rohit opens the bat-face and steers it down to third man
fuller in length and that drew Rohit forward but the line was still outside off and he shouldered arms.

Thanks for coming! It was all so simple; something that you see usually in the catching practice in the morning before the game. This delivery kicked up from short of length outside off stump and Rohit opened the bat-face and guided it straight to first slip. Simple. Tuffey smiles.
full in length and in the channel outside off, Raina's footwork suggests he was expecting something shorter and is beaten, pushing inside the line. Taylor holds his head.
gets back and across to defend this short-of-length delivery back down the track

Almost another one. Tuffey is on the money here. It landed short of length in line of the stumps and seamed away. Raina went back and stabbed at it but the bat went inside the line and the ball flew past the outside edge

He loves that drive through extra cover. The opportunity came when Tuffey pushed this fuller and invited that drive. You can see the intent- hope that Raina was expecting short ball and would be late on getting to the front foot and perhaps an edge would come. But Raina glided forward to caress it through extra cover
short in length around the middle and leg, clipped to the on side
back of length around off stump, punched to mid-off
kicks up from short of length around off and middle, Yuvraj is squared-up a bit and pokes it to the off side
full in length and outside the off stump, left alone
lands short of length around the leg stump, moves towards middle and off, Yuvraj crouches to push it to the on side
around the off and middle, length delivery, pushed out to covers
short in length and well outside the off stump, Raina punches it on the up through the off side

Oh well! Edged straight to second slip. It was a short-of-length delivery outside off stump and Raina stabbed at it, bat away from the body, and it goes straight to the slip cordon. The ball cut away from him and he ended up chasing it.

Loud shout for lbw Tuffey screams. Tuffey pleads. Tuffey is holding his knees. It landed back of length and moved in towards the middle. Dhoni pushed outside the line and it hit him front of the stumps. It hit the inner half of the front pad and deflected to the back pad. Saved by the height there. It would have gone over the stumps
hmm .. shuffles right across to work this past square-leg
gets forward to squeeze this one out
Dhoni's plan so far: Walk right across the stumps and try to play it to the on side. He tries again edges this to backward point
wide outside off stump, left alone
leans across to square drive but Williamson makes a tumbling save at backward point.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
pushes this well outside off stump, Yuvraj thinks about a drive but lets it fly past him
in the zone outside off stump, pushed out to covers
moves in from outside off, Yuvraj goes back to defend the short-of-length delivery
in the channel outside off stump, Yuvraj shoulders arms.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
goes towards the off-stump and pushes it to point
ooh How did that miss the edge? That shuffle carried Dhoni to outside-off and right into trouble zone. The ball straightened outside off and he ended up chasing it, poking at it but escaped
gets forward this time to drive the fullish delivery to mid-on

Dhoni is run out and he walks. His scratchy innings comes to an end. This one was jabbed close to the off side and he wants a single. His partner doesn't. Yuvraj took couple of steps down the track and froze. And Dhoni tries to turn back. Too late. Tuffey had already screamed past him, swooped on the ball and flicked a direct hit. Gone!
short of length, straightens around the middle and strikes the pad high. Too high.
Almost! It was in the zone outside off stump and Yuvraj pushes at it before withdrawing his bat
in the zone outside off, left alone
And again. Yuvraj Singh lets this one go through to the keeper
this is a bouncer and Yuvraj sways away. India need 235 runs more
leans forward to push this length delivery to mid-on
Oh dear! almost ... Full in length and just outside off stump, Yuvraj pushes inside the line.
this one comes in from outside off, pushed out down the track
leans forward to push to covers
full in length and outside off stump, Jadeja leans across to push it through cover point
short in length, on the off and middle, squeezed behind square-leg
How many times has Tuffey missed the outside edge today? Another one now. It cuts away from the off stump and Jadeja is beaten, pushing out at it
similar delivery and this time Jadeja shoulders arms
covers the off stump and shoulders arms
Almost yorker length! And Yuvraj does well to dig it out.
cuts in with bounce, from outside off stump, pushed out to mid-off
short and wide, Yuvraj senses an opportunity to  break free and goes after it but unable to connect
Crunchy short-arm pull! It was around the off-stump line and Yuvraj short-arm pulls it over midwicket

And ladies and gentlemen, we have another man swallowed in that slip cordon. Very simple again. Fullish and outside off stump, Yuvraj has a waft and Taylor takes a catch. Too simple, some might  say. Anyway that's that. India tottering at 62 for 6
fullish again,. around the off stump, pushed out back to him
around the off stump, guided to backward point
short in length, on the middle and off, clipped to the on side
back of length, around the off and middle, pushed to the on side

kicks up from short of length, extra bounce and Jadeja is in trouble, he yanks out his bottom-hand of the bat and jabs it away to the off. The second it here refers to teh ball and not his bottom hand of course. Seriously?!
leans forward to on drive it neatly clear of mid-on fielder.
retains the strike with a dab shot to point
hops to push the shortish delivery to short midwicket
around the off stump, pushed out to the off side
bouncer around the off stump line, PK sways away
from round the stumps now, full in length, outside off, squeezed to point
kicks up from short of length, moves in from outside off, with that round-the-stumps angle and PK jabs at it. The ball cuts between bat and pad and lfies to the keeper
moves outside leg stump and drives to mid-off

Awww. That slip catch again. Well... the top order didn't last. Why would the lower-order batsmen? It was the short of length delivery that kicked up outside off and PK steers it straight to slip cordon.
leans forward to defend to the off side
In the zone outside off stump, has a lame poke at it and the keeper collects.

banged in short on the leg stump line, Mithun thinks he is indeed playing the gully cricket and tries to tap it back with a vertical bat as if he was playing badminton and the ball flies to the keeper
homing in on the off stump line and it thuds into the thigh pad
in the channel outside off stump and Mithun tries to give a catch to slips but fails.
fullish, tailing in late, Jadeja treis to flick it and is hit on the pad. Nehra does some stretching exercises. He is expecting to walk out to bat any time, isn't he?
good bouncing short delivery outside off stump and Jadeja hops. He then stabs it off the top edge over slips!
from round the stumps, on the hips, tucked to fine-leg region
short of length, bounces into the middle and leg line, turned to the on side
fullish, around the off stump line, pushed to the point region

yorker length on the middle and leg, from round the stumps, Mithun does well to take the front leg out of the way and jabs it out. He has had that practice after playing so well against Malinga in the Test series
Short in length and Jadeja unfurls a top punchy shot through point.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
slower one from round the stumps, it lands on a length and cuts away past the outside edge; jadeja was looking to defend
hmmm .. in the zone outside off, Jadeja decides late to flash at it and is beaten
bouncer outside off, from round the stumps, left alone
floats this gently in the off-stump corridor, left alone
length delivery around off stump, driven to covers
full in length, from round the stumps and it shaped away ever so late .. and Mithun edges the drive to third man
kicks from short of length around off stump, Jadeja stabs it away. Extra bounce there.
Beaten again. Hmmm. Unlucky Mckay. This one straightened outside off and Jadeja had a poke. Almost fatal
cuts in with bounce from outside off, pushed out to point
short in length and it kicks into the rib cage, tucked to midwicket
short in length around off stump line, pushed out to point
Hello! That badminton shot again. It was the bouncer and Mithun was on the front foot; he paused, got the bat in a vertical position and tapped it towards midwicket1
length delivery in the zone outside off, left alone
banged in short and Jadeja is almost late in dropping his wrists and getting the bat out of the way. The ball wasn't all that far away from the gloves when it whizzed past
the bouncer at the body and Jadeja plays a limp pull shot and the ball lobs over to the unmanned square-leg region
full in length outside off stump, Mithun tries to square drive. The ball goes to the keeper.
floated well outside off, driven to short extra cover
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
leans forward to push this to short cover
fuller, dips on Jadeja who on drives to mid-on
turns on the off and middle line, edged to the off side
goes back to nurdle this behind square-leg
banged in short, pulled away to midwicket
in the zone outside off stump, mithun pushes inside the line and is beaten. Again.
The slow bouncer and Mithun swats it, yeah swats it, almost straight to deepish midwicket
gets back to punch it to mid-off
the short delivery and Raina taps it to the on side.  Raina! Where did that come from. It's jadeja with the awkward fend to the on side
Yep. You guessed it right. Another slip catch. Fullish and outside off stump and Mithun edges his drive. Just two more now. How quickly can NZ wrap this up?
chases this well-outside off delivery but can't connect
leans forward to defend to the off
short and wide, Jadeja cuts to sweeper cover
leans forward to defend and is hit on the pad
leans forward to drive towards mid-off
on the pads, tucked to fine-leg
leans across to defend to the off
leans across to push this to covers
short in length and around the off, defended to the off side
how did that miss the outside edge? How did that miss the off stump? Length delivery that goes past everything
gets behind the line of this to defend
leans forward to drive to covers

And another slip catch. Loverly! It was floated well outside off stump and Jadeja chased it for a big drive. Styris takes the catch. Where is Taylor I say? Williamson was out for a duck but picks up a wicket now. Life can't be that bad eh?
flighted around off, turns past the edge
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
floats this outside off, left alone
turns away from the off stump, left alone
short in length and outside off, pushed to backward point
Whack! It was the short-of-length delivery and Nehra pulled it to the right of mid-on!
And it's all over. Full and outside off and Nehra drives it straight to mid-off. NZ win by 200 runs. Magnificent thumping win! A rout!
